name: Display name of the pack:
support: Support of the pack, options are demisto / partner / developer / community :
beta: Whether is beta version, options are True or False :
deprecated: Whether pack is deprecated, options are True or False:
certification: Certification of the pack, options are certified or verified :
serverLicense: Server license, options are standard or premium :
author: Author of the pack:
url: The url of support, should represent your GitHub account:
email: The email in which you can be contacted in:
dependencies: Additional dependencies of the pack - comma separated values:
